title: Project-Based Learning (PBL) Course for Strengthening Teacher Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Knowledge of Instructional Design and Teaching Methodologies, Literature Analysis, and Data Processing Experience
context.additional_context: Development of design competencies focused on solving real-world educational challenges, targeting current professionals

learning_goals: Explain the 10 core elements of teachers’ design competencies using literature analysis and network analysis techniques.
Map and visualize the teacher design process based on real educational cases.
Propose value-creation methods for teachers’ design competencies through project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
